across-the-board.translation[0].definiti: affecting everyone or everything in a situation or organization
In July everything we sell is reduced right across the board.
across-the-board.translation[1].definiti: if something happens or is done across the board, it affects everyone in a particular group, place etc
The changes will affect local authorities across the board.
We find jobs for people right across the board, from chief executives to cleaners.
across-the-board.translation[2].definiti: affecting everyone or everything in an organization or situation
They have agreed to production cuts as long as they are across the board.
Nursing unions are demanding a 4% across-the-board pay increase.
